.. index:: ThreeSpace

.. _l54687265655370616365:

ThreeSpace R
============

:viewcode:`space.spad line 278 <space.spad#L278>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <space.spad#L278>`

* R: \ :ref:`Ring <l52696e67>`\ 


The domain ThreeSpace is used for creating three dimensional objects using functions for defining points, curves, polygons, constructs and the subspaces containing them.


.. _l54687265655370616365-3d:
